Applicant : Cummings, LuAnn
School (district) : Lake City High School (Coeurdalene)
Role(s) : Special Education Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I work as a special educator and I often feel as if my population of students is "left out" of STEM activities.  I would like to know how to bring them into my classroom for learning.  This process will make me a better educators and able to provide for immersion for my students.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
